events.description: {{subject}} is now flooding the market. Prices are dropping.
{{subject}} is now hard to find. Prices are rising.
{{subject}} was hazed in an attack. Spoils are selling for cheap.
{{subject}} was struck by sickness and facing poverty.
{{subject}} has become a hub for traders. Prices are rising.
{{subject}} has become successful and well managed. Their goods are trading at a premium.
